name: temporal-data-skeleton
description: Webapp to visualize temporal data skeletons

scripts.build: npm run env NODE_ENV=development && npm run build_css && npm run build_js
scripts.dev: npm run env NODE_ENV=development && npm run build_css && npm run watch_js
scripts.bundle: npm run env NODE_ENV=production && npm run bundle_css && npm run bundle_js
scripts.bundle_js: browserify -t babelify -o dist/bundle.js src/main.js && unglifyjs dist/bundle.js --overwrite

author: Alexis Schad <alexis@ytotech.com>, Félix Alié <someonefefe@gmail.com>, Damien Delmas <dfdelmas@gmail.com>
